article_title: 40 States Get An 'F' On Access To Doctor Information

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Most states fail when it comes to providing publicly available information on the quality of their physicians, according to a new report. The Health Care Incentives Improvement Institute gave 40 states and the District of Columbia a failing grade of “F” while four other states received a “D,” which is also [...]
